title: Grand Opening: Luxury Lakeside Glamping near Tamworth with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to New South Walesâ€™ Big Sky Country with a stay at this barefoot luxury retreat. Tucked away above Lake Keepit, this secluded glamping destination offers eight elegant skydome tents - each featuring a private ensuite, outdoor bath and skylight, perfect for stargazing. Whether you're unwinding on your deck, spotting local wildlife or exploring the serene landscape, Wilderluxe Lake Keepit invites you to reconnect with nature.

Try stand-up paddleboarding on the lake, or immerse yourself in the Aboriginal astronomy night with sunset drinks and nibbles. Just a short drive away, Carroll Gap Farmhouse tempts with cheese-making classes and seasonal farmhouse dining.

When it's time to relax and connect, gather in the Gilay Lounge - the private guest space designed for shared moments. Opt for a delicious upgrade and enjoy a gourmet BBQ pack and picnic hamper. Whether you're seeking a romantic escape or a group adventure, discover a peaceful retreat that harmonises wild luxury with outback charm.
offer_address: Keepit Dam Road, Lake Keepit, New South Wales 2340, Australia
